title: Hexxed Branch
summaries: The Hexxed Branch is a Hardmode, post-Plantera mount-summoning item that summons a rideable Tree Mount, a ground-based mount that is unable to fly. While traveling at full speed, enemies in its path will be hit by 120 base summon damage.
